description: This week TommyD is looking to change things up a little bit and has brought us a new recruit!His new friend Rey Gold is a stud straight from the gym that TommyD has been looking at working with for a while now. He finally talked Rey into coming in and doing a solo scene for TommyD and his Members. Rey is one of the best built and best looking guys we have seen on camera since we first saw TommyD himself.For this scene we turned the camera over to TommyD and let him do all the work and have all the fun. Rey answers a series of TommyD inspired questions before taking off all his clothes and showing us what TommyD has been wanting us to see for so long.Enjoy!!!
title: Initiation To The Gay World
